methods.description: Method to determine that interface has been properly initialized.

params.name: directory
params.description: Directory to append to the script's working directory.

methods.description: Register a directory to search for fonts.

params.name: directory
params.description: Directory to append to the script's working directory.

methods.description: Register a directory to search for audio.

methods.name: setWindowTitle

params.name: title
params.description: What title should appear on the window header bar.

methods.description: Change the title that appears in the window header.

methods.name: setWindowSize
methods.description: Change the size of the window.

methods.name: registerLevel
methods.description: Registers a level in the world.

methods.name: setLevel
methods.description: Sets the current level of the world.

methods.name: spawn
methods.description: Builds the named TIEntity and spawns it into the world.
